General.Name: Zhuhai CosMX Battery Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhuhai CosMX Battery Co., Ltd. manufactures and supplies polymer lithium-ion batteries in China and internationally. The company offers mobile phone, laptop, mini, and other batteries. Its products are also used in electric motorcycles, new energy vehicles, energy storage, and other fields. The company was formerly known as Zhuhai Coslight Battery Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zhuhai CosMX Battery Co., Ltd. in March 2019. Zhuhai CosMX Battery Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Zhuhai, China.
